body: @shurcooL In hopes of being helpful, you might try to migrate your tools to use something else. For instance you could try http://godoc.org/github.com/kardianos/govendor/context create a new context then call ctx.Status(), then filter all the returned items by their "status" which includes if they are in a vendor directory or not. If that doesn't quite fit your need, but is close, feel free to open an issue.
